errors.opponentNoCompanion: that player does not own a companion!
errors.cantPlay: you need {{amount}} credits to play but currently only have {{balance}}!
errors.cantChallenge: the player does not have enough credits to play!
errors.noBattle: this channel has no ongoing battles!
errors.notParticipating: that player is not a participant of this battle!
errors.isParticipant: you're a participant of this battle and can't place bets!
errors.cantBet: you don't have enough credits ({{balance}}) to bet {{amount}}!
errors.betMulti: you can't bet more than once!
errors.plsBetProperly: you can't bet less than one credit!
errors.notBetting: the battle has not entered the betting phase!
errors.afterBetting: the betting phase has already concluded for this battle!
errors.notOnline: that user is not online yet!

challenge: you have challenged {{mention}} to a pet battle!
The player has {{time}} seconds to respond with {{accept}} or {{reject}}, otherwise they automatically forfeit!
companion.bet: you have placed a bet of {{amount}} credits on {{user}} and his companion {{pet}}!
companion.timedOut: {{p2}} failed to respond to {{p1}}'s challenge after {{time}} seconds and has forfeited.
acceptChallenge: The battle will commence in {{time}} seconds!
companion.renameDialog: {{user}}, what would you like to rename your {{pet}} companion to?
companion.renameSuccess: you have renamed your {{pet}} companion to {{newName}}!

HIT: {{p1}} administers a strong hit to {{p2}}, dealing {{dmg}} damage!
{{p1}} lands a strike on {{p2}}, who suffers {{dmg}} damage!
{{p2}} suffers a pounding by {{p1}}, who hits for {{dmg}} damage!
{{p1}} secures a good hit on {{p2}}, delivering {{dmg}} damage!

credits.topup: {{amount}} credits have been added to your account.
confirmation: you have transferred {{amount}} credits to {{user}}'s account.
credits.invalidCode: you have entered an invalid code! Your credits haven't been transferred.
credits.selfSenderError: you can't send credits to yourself!
credits.botUserError: you can't send credits to bots!

descriptions.prefix: Allows moderators to set a guild's prefix
descriptions.summon: Summons me to a voice channel
descriptions.contact: Report bugs, request features or leave feedback
descriptions.enable: Enable commands for a channel, user or role
descriptions.disable: Disable commands for a channel, user or role
descriptions.lang: Allows moderators to set a guild's language
descriptions.allow: Allows channels, users or roles to use commands
descriptions.ignore: Prevents channels, users or roles from using commands
descriptions.purge: Bulk delete messages from a channel
descriptions.repeat: Toggles repeat mode, where finished songs get re-added in the queue
descriptions.dice: Rolls some dice, using dice notation
descriptions.subscribe: Subscribes a channel to an event
descriptions.unsubscribe: Unsubscribes a channel from an event
descriptions.timezone: Allows moderators to set a guild's timezone

join: üëã  Hello! I'm **haru**! Everyone's favourite idol ‚ú®üé§ and part-time bot! ü§ñ
You can find a list of my commands by typing {{help}} into chat!
To learn more about me, use the {{about}} command!

help.header_1: To run a command, invoke it with {{prefix}} in {{server}}
help.header_2: To get more help on a command, call {{helpCommand}}
help.footer: For support, suggestions and feedback, visit {{link}}
footer_group: Omit `<>` or `[]` when invoking a command

info: Everyone's favourite idol ‚ú®üé§ and part-time bot! ü§ñ
invite: For suggestions and support, visit my server at {{server}}!
info.warn: Please ensure you have embeds enabled!
info.author: Author
info.join: For support, suggestions and feedback, visit {{link}}

music.dcInactive: Disconnected from voice channel due to inactivity.
music.clearQueue: The music queue has been cleared.

errors.notInChannel: bring me into a voice channel with {{command}} first!
emptyQueue: there is nothing in the queue!
Use the {{play}} command to queue a song!
errors.tooLong: that song is too long! Queue one shorter than 90 minutes.
errors.alreadyPlaying: there is already a song being played! Queue another song with {{command}}.
errors.notChannel: the current bound text channel is {{channel}}. Please use the music commands there.
errors.notFound: the video you provided could not be found.
errors.listNotFound: the playlist you provided could not be found.
errors.emptyPlaylist: the playlist you provided has no streamable videos.
errors.notInVoice: you need to be in a voice channel!
errors.alreadyBinded: I am already bound to {{text}}! Use commands in that channel.
errors.noPerms: I don't have the permissions to `connect` and/or `speak` in {{voice}}!
errors.error: something bad happened! Please try again later, or submit a bug report.
errors.notInSameVoice: you need to be in the voice channel {{channel}}!
errors.skipNotFound: the video specified could not be found.

music.switch: Switching to streaming mode and playing from {{station}}
music.votedSkip: you have already voted to skip this song!
music.voteSkipSuccess: you have voted to skip the current song!
music.votedClear: you have already voted to clear the queue!
music.voteClearSuccess: you have voted to clear the current queue!
joinSuccess: Use the {{command}} command to start playing songs!
music.repeatOn: you have enabled repeat mode. All finished songs will be re-added to the back of the queue.
music.repeatOff: you have disabled repeat mode. All finished songs will not be re-added.
terminated: The bot is being restarted, all voice connections have been terminated.
The current queue has been saved in the database.
We apologise for any inconvenience caused.

purge.filterSuccess: purged {{num}} messages matching the following criteria: {{criteria}}

prefix.success: successfully changed this guild's prefix to {{prefix}}
prefix.revert: reverted this guild's prefix back to {{prefix}}

lang.success: successfully changed this guild's language to {{lang}}

tz.success: successfully changed this guild's timezone to {{tz}}
notFound: Visit {{link}} for a list of valid timezone codes.

eventNotFound: the event {{event}} could not be found.
subscribe.notSubscribed: {{channel}} is not subscribed to any events.

insufficient: You can use the command {{command}} to claim free credits every few hours!

slots.lost: {{user}} placed a bet of {{amount}} credits and lost all of it.
